resources.string: Bluetooth not available. CueSense requires a device that supports Bluetooth.
Bluetooth not enabled. Please enable Bluetooth and restart the app.
Unable to connect to your wearable. Please make sure it is switched on and restart CueSense.
Connection to your wearable lost. Reconnecting..
Enter the text for the Cue below
No Cues added. Add one using the add button above.
This will delete this Cue permanently. What would you like to do?
Login to Facebook in Settings to include your Facebook data
There was a problem getting your Facebook data. Please logout and login again.
Note: CueSense does not post anything to Facebook.
Note: CueSense does not post anything to Twitter.
Login to Twitter in Settings to include your Twitter data
There\'s nothing to display. Try logging in to a social network in Settings or add your own cue in the CueSense tab.
